page.title: 09Coal Packers,Brenchley
page.content: A.Berry and Son Ltd. was founded in Petteridge in 1959 and now{supplies a {large area of South East England with {prepacked coal.}Packs are supplied to garages and shops in Kent, East Sussex and south London and some 400 local households receive direct deliveries. {Six people}are employed.Three to pack the coal,two in the yard and to make deliveries and one person in the office with Mr.Berry. About 2500 tons of fuel annually are packed into 28lb bags for retailers and 56lb bags for house deliveries. Fuels are Group 2 and 3 household coal,brickettes and smokeless fuels Coalite and ovals for open fires and smokeless fuels beans, grains,ovals, Rexco and Coalite for boilers.Heatlog, a reconstituted fuel,and firewood are also supplied.Some Group 1 household coal is supplied to a steamboat.
